titles.title: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes: Fun Fun Pearly Night - Ken to Janet no Okurimono
Tantei Opera Milky Holmes: Fun Fun Pearly Night - The Gift of Ken and Janet
探偵オペラ ミルキィホームズ ファンファンパーリーナイト♪ ~ケンとジャネットの贈り物~
侦探歌剧 少女福尔摩斯 派对之夜

character.name: Hercule Burton
character.description: Hercules Barton is a very shy girl, named after Hercule Poirot, who is easily embarrassed. Her Toy gives her superhuman strength.

character.name: Cordelia Glauca
character.description: Cordelia is a blonde girl who often gets delusional concerning the relationship within the group, named after Cordelia Gray. She tends to get rather delusional whenever she is scared. Her Toy allows her to see and hear things others cannot.

character.name: Sherlock Shellinford
character.description: Sherlock Sherringford is the leader of Milky Holmes, named after Sherlock Holmes. She`s known to be particularly clumsy but is always caring. Her Toy gives her telekinesis.

character.name: Yuzurizaki Nero
character.description: Yuzurizaki Nero is an obnoxious girl with a hefty appetite, named after Nero Wolfe. She speaks with the masculine term boku. Her Toy allows her to control machines.

character.name: Arsene
character.description: Arsene is the leader of the Gentlemen Thieves whose Toys can cast illusions. She is currently undercover as the Student Council President at Holmes Academy. She craves strong opponents such as Sherlock to fight against, so when Milky Holmes lose their Toys, she strives to help them to return to their most powerful states so they can satisfy her. Named after Arsène Lupin, her toys is the toys of Resplendence.

character.name: Stone River
character.description: Stone River is a stern man who battles with a katana. His Toys allow him to immobilize an opponent. Undercover as a school janitor. Named after Ishikawa Goemon.

character.name: Twenty
character.description: Twenty is a crafty magician who uses various English words and attacks using cards. He is wildly perverted and constantly shows off his erect nipples to the chagrin of the students. His toys allows him to disguise perfectly. Undercover as a teacher. His name is based after Edogawa Rampo`s The Fiend of Twenty Faces.

character.name: Rat
character.description: Rat is a young boy with a Flame Toy used for lighting various explosives. Undercover as a classmate. Named after Nezumi Kozou.

character.name: Akechi Kokoro
character.description: Akechi Kokoro is the leader of Genius 4 (known as G4 for short), a police investigation unit. She is a bossy girl who looks down on Milky Holmes since they lost their toys. She smacks Sherlock with a golden mask whenever she calls her Kokoro-chan. Her name is based on Edogawa Rampo`s Kogoro Akechi.

character.name: Tooyama Saku
character.description: Touyama Saku is a soft spoken girl who wears headphones. She appears to have a thing for retro technology. Her name is based on Touyama Kagemoto.

character.name: Zenigata Tsugiko
character.description: Zenigata Tsugiko is a spunky green haired girl. Her name is based on Zenigata Heiji.

character.name: Hasegawa Hirano
character.description: Hasegawa Hirano is a polite girl who can deal a sleep-inducing karate chop. Her name is based on Hasegawa Heizou.

character.name: Myoujingawa Alice
character.description: Alice is a member of Milky Feathers which is understudy group of Milky Holmes. Her partner is Kazumi.

character.name: Tokiwa Kazumi
character.description: Kazumi is a member of Milky Feathers which is understudy group of Milky Holmes. Her partner is Alice.
